* Iron Raptor stepped back a little when the console opened, blinking as she 
saw footage of a Maximal behind bars and struggling upon the floor.
What was this?!
Iron narrowed her eyes as the camera zoomed up on Condor, sneering at the 
voice that presented itself. Hoarse and evil.
She growled as the screen switched, lowering her voice.*

" ...Megatron...."

* Her expression remained fixed as he just tood there, one the screen with 
two of his henchmen at his side.
What did he want? It had to do something with Condor, obviously. Probably 
wabted to exchange something to get the Maximal back, or work a deal.
Iron let out a breath, no need to stand straight because she always did.*

" What do you want?"
